About me

I started my career in science working on my Phd in artificial intelligence, where after two years I made my career move to dive into startup life and pure software development. I am a big advocate of agile development, and love to work with like-minded developers. Yet I also like to teach to and collaborate with people of the non-technical kind. I consider myself easily bridging the gap between the technical and the business, having the required people and communications skills.

In my free time I love to do kickboxing, sprinting and hiking, and I'm really into the Paleo lifestyle.

If you are interested to know me better and see whether we could do business together, then I'm always in for a cup of coffee or a fresh beer!

For my full CV, please check out LinkedIn.

I'd like to finish with one of my favorite quotes borrowed from Julias Caesar, which is right up my alley along the lines of my "Do or Die" philosophy.

It is only hubris if you lose. - JC Stevens 2009

Technology Skills

  • Programming: Python / Node.js / Clojure
  • NoSQL: MongoDb / Cassandra / Elasticsearch
  • BigData: Hadoop / Spark / Storm
